turns.user_input: my landlord is not returning my security deposit

agent_response.legal_route: Send legal notice to landlord and approach rent tribunal or housing court.
agent_response.outcome: Deposit refund, rent reduction, or lease termination.
process_steps: 2. Review your lease agreement and local tenant laws
3. Send written notice to landlord (certified mail)
5. File complaint with local rent tribunal/housing court

glossary.legal notice: A formal written communication from one party to another regarding legal matters.
glossary.tribunal: A special court or judicial body that handles particular types of legal matters.

agent_response.raw_query: my landlord is not returning my security deposit
agent_response.constitutional_backing:
üèõÔ∏è CONSTITUTIONAL FRAMEWORK FOR PROPERTY RIGHTS:

üìã Article 300A - Right to Property:
   ‚Ä¢ No person shall be deprived of property save by authority of law
   ‚Ä¢ Protection against arbitrary seizure of security deposits
   ‚Ä¢ Legal procedure required for any property deprivation

üìã Article 21 - Right to Life:
   ‚Ä¢ Right to shelter as part of right to life
   ‚Ä¢ Protection against illegal eviction
   ‚Ä¢ Dignified living conditions

üìã Article 19(1)(e) - Right to Reside:
   ‚Ä¢ Freedom to reside and settle in any part of India
   ‚Ä¢ Protection against forced displacement

‚öñÔ∏è SUPPORTING LEGAL FRAMEWORK:
   ‚Ä¢ Rent Control Acts (State-specific)
   ‚Ä¢ Transfer of Property Act, 1882
   ‚Ä¢ Consumer Protection Act, 2019

turns.user_input: someone hacked my bank account and stole money

agent_response.legal_route: Report to Cyber Crime Cell and file complaint under IT Act, 2000.
agent_response.outcome: Investigation, recovery of funds, or prosecution.
process_steps: 1. Preserve all digital evidence (screenshots, emails, messages)
2. Report immediately to local Cyber Crime Cell
3. File FIR at nearest police station
4. Submit complaint on National Cyber Crime Portal
5. Freeze affected bank accounts if financial fraud
8. Follow up on case progress and recovery
agent_response.raw_query: someone hacked my bank account and stole money
agent_response.constitutional_backing: Constitutional rights to privacy and freedom of expression apply to digital spaces and cyber crimes. Relevant constitutional provisions include Article 21, Article 14, Article 19.
